mapper.select: select x.file_id file_id, x.ip, x.file_name, x.file_size, x.file_conversation_size, x.file_expiration_period , (select a.code_detail_value from code_info a where a.code_id = '0001' and a.code_lang_type = #{code_lang_type} and a.code_detail_id = x.file_expiration_period) file_expiration_period_hour , x.file_create_datetime, x.file_expiration_datetime, x.file_system_create_datetime, x.file_system_expiration_datetime from file_info x where x.ip = #{IP} and x.file_delete_yn = 'N' and x.file_system_expiration_datetime > left(cast(now() as varchar), 19) order by x.file_system_create_datetime asc
mapper.insert: insert into file_info (ip, file_name, file_size, file_conversation_size, file_expiration_period, file_create_datetime, file_system_create_datetime, file_expiration_datetime, file_system_expiration_datetime) values (#{IP}, #{FileName}, #{FileSize}, #{FileConversationSize}, #{FilePeriodType}, #{datetime}, #{system_datetime}, #{expiration_datetime}, #{system_expiration_datetime})
